00021 template <class entity_type>
00022 class StateMachine
00023 {
00024 public:
00025 
00033         StateMachine(entity_type* FSMowner)
00034         {
00035                 m_owner = FSMowner;
00036                 m_prevState = NULL;
00037                 m_currState = NULL;
00038                 m_globalState = NULL;
00039         }
00040 
00050         void SetPrevState(State<entity_type>* state) { m_prevState = state; }
00051 
00061         void SetCurrState(State<entity_type>* state) { m_currState = state; }
00062 
00072         void SetGlobalState(State<entity_type>* state) { m_globalState = state; }
00073 
00081         void Update() const
00082         {
00083                 if (m_globalState)
00084                         m_globalState->Execute(m_owner);
00085                 if (m_currState)
00086                         m_currState->Execute(m_owner);
00087         }
00088 
00098         void ChangeState(State<entity_type>* newState)
00099         {
00100                 m_prevState = m_currState;
00101                 m_currState->Exit(m_owner);
00102                 m_currState = newState;
00103                 m_currState->Enter(m_owner);
00104         }
00105 
00113         void RevertToPrevState() { m_currState = m_prevState; }
00114 
00122         State<entity_type>* GetPrevState() { return m_prevState; }
00123 
00131         State<entity_type>* GetCurrState() { return m_currState; }
00132 
00140         State<entity_type>* GetGlobalState() { return m_globalState; }
00141 
00151         bool IsInState(const State<entity_type>& state) const { return typeid(*m_currState) == typeid(state); }
00152 
00158         //virtual ~StateMachine() {}
00159 
00160 private:
00161 
00163         entity_type* m_owner;
00164 
00166         State<entity_type> *m_prevState;
00167 
00169         State<entity_type> *m_currState;
00170 
00172         State<entity_type> *m_globalState;
00173 };
